name: Fruit Ball 2 - DEMO
description:
This is a DEMO for Fruit Ball 2~

w o w   :O

When you get to the end of the level there's just like a minecart and a cave that you can't enter, then that's the end of the demo sorry!
IMPORTANT - I haven't added a quit button :O so just hold ALT and press F4 to close the game, or some other method idk.

If you want me to finish the game (I already have like 5 longer levels done, so the game only needs a bit more to be completed!) then you can support it!

Feedback is appreciated! Please comment it :D

Feedback is how I can improve the game, it's not done yet!
